c-1: ^What are your thoughts on the others in the archipelago?

c-0: ^What's your story? How did you come to live here?
^I happened upon this place some... twenty years ago?
^I was exploring, you see. Wasn't expecting to be smacked outta the waters by that mean ol' Kraken.
^Sodding beast caught my eye, though! Got me thinking of what other creatures this archipelago houses.
^Figured I could stay a while, check things out.
^I can't say I intended on sticking around this long. Got a little attached in the process, you see.
^The ecosystem here is unlike anything I've ever seen! I've been keeping an eye on it ever since.
^Not much else to say, really. Anything else you're curious 'bout?
c-1: ^Do you ever want to leave this place?
^Only way I'd ever leave is if you drag me out of here. And even then, I wouldn't make it easy for you!
^I have no intention of leaving all this behind. Sure, there are some downsides to living here...
^...but I've made this place my home, and these fish won't look after themselves!

c-0: ^Bengt is a good sort! And having a boat mechanic around does wonders for our fishing practices.
^Anytime one of our fishers bumps into a boulder or what have you, I send them out to Bengt for a fix-up.
^Sometimes they even come back with a brand new motor, or a spiffed up hull.
^Agh, but I keep telling him not to do that!
^Can't have our fishers getting all careless out there thinking they'll get free upgrades should they crash.
^"I got ahead of myself, sorry!" he says, like it's nothing!
c-1: ^In case you didn't know already, her and I are... at slight odds.
^Rather one-sided on her end, if you ask me.
^She seems to think I don't care for the people living here, that I put the wildlife above them.
^Let me tell ya, that couldn't be further from the truth!
^The Kraken does pose a threat to our boaters, yes, but I train them to avoid that darned thing!
^Hell, part of her job is to keep an eye out for them.
^Should push come to shove, I trust that she'll keep them safe.
^But enough about that whole debate. Got anyone else in mind?

c-0: ^She was a total shut-in when she first came here...
^Any contact I had with her was always through her sister!
^I didn't get to know Irma herself until after... well, ya know.
^Ah, but we've become friends since then! Had a couple beers with her and we kicked the shit.
^I taught her how to properly dispose of electronics without it harming the ecosystem...
^...and she tried to teach me a thing or two about radio what-have-yous.
^Frankly, it all went in one ear and out the other.
c-1: ^Ulrich and I get along about as well as sharks and remoras!
^Ha! It means we get along great.
^He shows a great deal of care for his plants. Same way I care for our ocean life.
^We both have ecosystems to tend to, in a way. One just happens to be dryer than the other.
^Flora and fauna affects the environment, and the environment affects the waters.
^Now, if only those plants didn't mess so much with his sinuses. That's some bad luck he has.
